articles.title: HCLTech acquires German autonomous driving tech firm for $279 million - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The acquisition will help the IT services firm strengthen its capabilities in autonomous driving, e-mobility and connectivity; and expand into key automotive markets in Europe, Americas and Japan.
articles.content: Indias third largest IT services firm, HCLTech has acquired a 100 percent equity stake in German automotive engineering services provider ASAP Group. The acquisition will help the IT Company to stren… [+2217 chars]

articles.title: Aryna Sabalenka defeats Madison Keys in straight sets to reach Wimbledon semifinals - CNN
articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka reached her fourth consecutive grand slam semifinal on Wednesday, brushing aside America’s Madison Keys in the Wimbledon’s quarterfinals.
articles.content:
Aryna Sabalenka reached her fourth consecutive grand slam semifinal on Wednesday after brushing aside American Madison Keys in straight sets at Wimbledon.

articles.title: Black men face an increased risk of dying of melanoma, study finds - NBC News
articles.description: Black men are at a higher risk of death from melanoma than other racial groups, according to a study published Tuesday in the Journal of the American Academy of Dermatology (JAAD).
articles.content:
